alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 3:16PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 316 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Country Club, or near Miramar. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Hialeah, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Davie, Coral Gables, Miami Gardens, Weston, North Miami, Doral, North Miami Beach, Miami Lakes, Cooper City, Hialeah Gardens, Opa-Locka, West Park, Miami Springs, Sweetwater, and Miami Shores. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
